sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.OIDC_custom_facebook</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Script Include to override and customize the methods defined in OIDC_internal Script Include to perform custom requirements.


///use below script to add authn options like deepLink & skipNavFrame.
getRelayStateOptions: function() {
		var reqOptions = {'skipNavFrame': 'true' , 'deepLink':'custom_value'};
		return reqOptions;
	},

///use --> getUserInfoClaims() &  getIdTokenClaims() methods from OIDC_internal to get information about claims.

///use --> setCustomRelayState(relayState) method from OIDC_internal to set a custom relay state.


</description>
        <name>OIDC_custom_facebook</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var OIDC_custom_facebook = Class.create();
OIDC_custom_facebook.prototype = Object.extend(new OIDC_internal_facebook(), {
    initialize: function() {
        OIDC_internal_facebook.prototype.initialize.call(this);
    },

    type: 'OIDC_custom_facebook'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-07-26 15:10:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>677f1852c32130102c5b4e483c40dd5d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>OIDC_custom_facebook</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Integration - Multiple Provider Single Sign-On (do not activate...use 'Integration - Multiple Provid" source="com.snc.integration.sso.multi">4762a9692fe21110d8a4d5f62799b613</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_677f1852c32130102c5b4e483c40dd5d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-07-27 09:13:22</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>291</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
